title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 317.10 - Reuse of official inspection marks; reuse of containers bearing official marks, labels, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 317.10 - Reuse of official inspection marks; reuse of containers bearing official marks, labels, etc

State Regulations
(a) No official
inspection legend or other official mark which has been previously used shall
be used again for the identification of any product, except as provided for in
subdivision (b) of this section. (b) All stencils, marks, labels or other
labeling on previously used containers, whether relating to any product or
otherwise, shall be removed or obliterated before such containers are used for
any product, unless such labeling correctly indicates the product to be packed
therein and such containers are refilled under the supervision of a department
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
317.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
